Uses of Class
jparsec.astrophysics.photometry.Photometry.FILTER

  • Packages that use Photometry.FILTER 
    Package Description
    jparsec.astrophysics.photometry
    Classes to operate with astrophysical fluxes and photometric bands of instruments.

    • Uses of Photometry.FILTER in jparsec.astrophysics.photometry

      Methods in jparsec.astrophysics.photometry that return Photometry.FILTER 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Photometry.FILTER Photometry.FILTER.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static Photometry.FILTER[] Photometry.FILTER.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in jparsec.astrophysics.photometry with parameters of type Photometry.FILTER 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double Photometry.getBlackBodyColorIndex(double Tef, Photometry.FILTER filterID1, Photometry.FILTER filterID2, boolean vega)
      Deprecated. 
      This method is not accurate, use Photometry.getColorIndexUsingKuruczModels(double, double, double, FILTER, FILTER, boolean) instead.
      static double Photometry.getColorIndexUsingKuruczModels(double m, double r, double Tef, Photometry.FILTER filterID1, Photometry.FILTER filterID2, boolean vega)
      Returns the color index between two filters using Kurucz models.
      static Spectrum Photometry.getFilterSpectrum(Photometry.FILTER filterID, int np)
      Returns the transmitancy spectrum of a given filter.
      static double[] Photometry.getFilterTransmitancy(Photometry.FILTER filterID)
      Returns the filter set of transmitancies, each of them for the corresponding filter wavelength.
      static double[] Photometry.getFilterWavelengths(Photometry.FILTER filterID)
      Returns the filter set of wavelengths in microns.
      static double Photometry.getStarFlux(double Tef, Photometry.FILTER filterID)
      Returns the flux of a star for a given effective temperature and integrated over a given filter.
      static double Photometry.getStarFluxUsingKuruczModels(double m, double r, double Tef, Photometry.FILTER filterID)
      Returns the flux of a Kurucz star for a given effective temperature and integrated over a given filter.
